branchCategory.name: HRR, Rack Mounted Thermo Chiller, Air Cooled
branchCategory.description: <p>The HRR is a temperature control device mountable in a 19-inch rack.&nbsp; Rack mounting recovers desktop or floor space, permitting stacking of related devices and mobility, depending on the rack style.&nbsp; Recirculating fluid removes heat from the process source, which is then removed from the fluid by an air cooled refrigeration circuit.&nbsp; Air cooling frees the installation from dependence on facility cooling water.&nbsp; Coolant temperature stability is&nbsp;&plusmn;0.1&deg;C within a set temperature range of 10 to 35&deg;C.&nbsp; This device is self-contained with coolant and refrigerant circuits, fan cooled heat exchanger, electronic controls, pump, tank and power supply.</p>

breadCrumb.name: HRR, Rack Mounted Thermo Chiller, Air Cooled
